rComments: So passionate about Cinema and about his students. Provides film clips to illustrate examples form his lectures. Extremely detail oriented. Exams are 50% lecture questions and 50% textbook ONLY questions so study/read both. Watch films and listen to what he wants you to analyse in them. A group essay is the term end project.

He yells a lot, but it keeps things interesting. There's no falling asleep in his class. Though, I can't tell whether or not he actually knows what he's talking about. He isn't very good at conveying material. His grading method is crap -- focus on unimportant details rather than larger concepts. I really hope I don't have another class with him.
He yelled constantly. Very frightening. Was also obsessed with racism and poverty.

Awful. He seemed to constantly yell and emphasize every word, which really makes it hard to tolerate him. He was erratic. He screwed up the attendance for half our class. Any educational qualities he has were overshadowed by his unprofessional behaviour.
